channel.title: Help with 2 things
channel.description: hey, i have a 317 delta server and would like to know how to create new ranks and how to give these ranks their own icon. i would also like to know how to make it so that when i launch my client the cmd disappears but the client still runs. i tried adding exit to the bottom of my run.bat code but the cmd still stays. can somebody pl help me with these? ok i figued out how to remove the cmd but still need help with ranks.

item.title: Help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

an overall new rank, like you got owner, admin, mod and say i wanna make a donator rank. id like the new rank to have its own symbol like the crowns but also have its own player rights.

Read full topic

new ranks as in a new staff name or like a new crown?
